purpose: To enhance the capabilities of large language models (LLMs) by integrating domain expertise, enabling more accurate and context-aware responses in various applications.
principle: OpenAGI operates on the principle of collaborative intelligence, where the synergy of LLMs and human domain experts leads to improved decision-making and knowledge dissemination.
reusability: The components of OpenAGI are designed for modular integration, allowing developers to reuse its functionalities across different projects and applications.
limitations: As an experimental project in alpha status, OpenAGI may exhibit instability and limited functionality; it may not cover all domains comprehensively and is subject to ongoing development and improvements.
name: OpenAGI
description: OpenAGI: When LLM Meets Domain Experts
